review: Can stream just about anything from my computer to the tv in 480 p.rarely freezes and all you have to do to fix is click the video to buffer again. Still In beta though
author: kevin

review: This things are awesome had to buy one for every room in the house. Had one that stopped working after a week but seller replaced it with no problem. They even sent me a label to ship the bad one back at no additional cost
author: victor mollinedo jr

review: Very slow when mirroring my tablet.  Ok when using chrome cast but if not, performance is poor.  If using windows buy the Microsoft unit, it is fantastic for mirroring and PowerPoint presentations.
author: Dennis M.

review: Cheap, sleak, removable cable. Requires internet connection to stream content to you're TV. Pretty useless if you're traveling. They also don't advertise very well that this device requires an internet connection.
author: Fredrick Dean Allen

review: NEVER COULD GET IT TO WORK!
author: walter exon
